DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Agent Therapeutic Procedure Planned Occurrence Stratification Coded Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response as to whether a person intends to take protocol therapeutic agents as part of the randomization process.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Protocol Agent Therapeutic Procedure Planned Occurrence Stratification
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._An instance of an event or incident that is intended to take place._The process of classifying patients into a sequence of grades or ranks as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: An instance of an event or incident that is intended to take place.:The process of classifying patients into a sequence of grades or ranks as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.

Concepts.definition: An instance of an event or incident that is intended to take place.
The process of classifying patients into a sequence of grades or ranks as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Yes or No response to a question coded as 1 (Yes) or 2 (No).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the participant plan to
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant plan to receive ramucirumab plus docetaxel if randomized to the standard of care arm?
